editor.description: The editor field is used for opening buildspecs in an editor. The default editor is ``vim``.

buildspec_roots.description: Specify a list of directory paths to search buildspecs. This field can be used with ``buildtest buildspec find`` to rebuild buildspec cache or build tests using ``buildtest build`` command

testdir.description: Specify full path to test directory where buildtest will write tests.

compilers.description: Specify compiler configuration with respect to modules

executors.description: The executor section is used for declaring your executors that are responsible for running jobs. The executor section can be ``local``, ``lsf``, ``slurm``, ``ssh``. The executors are referenced in buildspec using ``executor`` field.

defaults.description: Specify default executor settings for all executors

pollinterval.description: Specify poll interval in seconds after job submission, where buildtest will sleep and poll all jobs for job states. This field can be configured based on your preference. Excessive polling every few seconds can result in system degradation.

launcher.description: Specify batch launcher to use when submitting jobs, this is applicable for LSF and Slurm Executors.

local.description: The ``local`` section is used for declaring local executors for running jobs on local machine

lsf.description: The ``lsf`` section is used for declaring LSF executors for running jobs using LSF scheduler

slurm.description: The ``slurm`` section is used for declaring Slurm executors for running jobs using Slurm scheduler

max_pend_time.description: Cancel job if it is still pending in queue beyond max_pend_time

account.description: Specify Job Account for charging resources

description.description: description field for documenting your executor

shell.description: Specify the shell launcher you want to use when running tests locally

description.description: description field for documenting your executor

launcher.description: Specify the slurm batch scheduler to use. This overrides the default ``launcher`` field. This must be ``sbatch``.

options.description: Specify any other options for ``sbatch`` used by this executor for running all jobs.

cluster.description: Specify the slurm cluster you want to use ``-M <cluster>``

partition.description: Specify the slurm partition you want to use ``-p <partition>``

qos.description: Specify the slurm qos you want to use ``-q <qos>``

description.description: description field for documenting your executor

launcher.description: Specify the lsf batch scheduler to use. This overrides the default ``launcher`` field. It must be ``bsub``.

options.description: Specify any options for ``bsub`` for this executor when running all jobs associated to this executor

queue.description: Specify the lsf queue you want to use ``-q <queue>``
